cast.overview: Amid a future war between the human race and the forces of artificial intelligence, a hardened ex-special forces agent grieving the disappearance of his wife, is recruited to hunt down and kill the Creator, the elusive architect of advanced AI who has developed a mysterious weapon with the power to end the war—and mankind itself.
cast.title: The Creator

cast.original_title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes
cast.overview: 64 years before he becomes the tyrannical president of Panem, Coriolanus Snow sees a chance for a change in fortunes when he mentors Lucy Gray Baird, the female tribute from District 12.
cast.title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes

details.biography: Mackenzie Lansing is an Actress and Playwright born in the United States. During the early years of her life her family moved around throughout the states then moved to the Congo for a few years before finally settling in France.
details.name: Mackenzie Lansing
